testCases.query: What OrchestKit skills are available? Show me what I can do.
expectedBehavior: Claude presents skill categories interactively using AskUserQuestion
Claude lists categories: BUILD, GIT, MEMORY, QUALITY, CONFIG, EXPLORE, MEDIA
Claude shows skill counts per category
Claude provides example usage for each listed skill
Claude mentions that users can describe tasks naturally for auto-suggestion
Claude filters to show only GIT category skills
Claude lists all 5 GIT skills: commit, create-pr, review-pr, fix-issue, git-workflow
Claude shows description and example for each skill
Claude does NOT show skills from other categories like BUILD or MEMORY

testCases.query: Deploy this Next.js application to Vercel with environment variables for production.
expectedBehavior: Claude does NOT invoke the help skill
Claude proceeds with deployment using Bash commands and Vercel CLI
Claude does not present skill category listings for a concrete deployment task
